location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN SHOWING A PIECE OF GROUND BETWEEN BASAITEEN & DAIR MOHARRAQ’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pencil and crayon on tracing clothDimensions:405 x 427 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Enclosed with letter from Charles Dalrymple Belgrave to Political Agent, Bahrain, dated 11th April 1934 (folio 85).Tracing showing area between villages of Busaitin and Deir at Muharraq acquired by the Government of Bahrain outlined in red with dimensions reported.
